feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
